text: aur (isee vajah se) hamane usako raphta raphta naazil kiya tum kah do ki khvaah tum is par eemaan lao ya na lao isamen shaq nahin ki jin logon ko usake qabl hee (aasamaanee kitaabon ka ilm ata kiya gaya hai unake saamane jab ye padha jaata hai to thudadiyon se (munh ke bal) sajade mein gir padaten hain
